TextView.android:text: How to Use the QR Code Interface.

If you are looking at any mineral sample in the museum and you want to find out more information about it, the QR interface on this app is a quick and easy way for you to do so. This is how you use it: 1. Choose the Minerals Menu option from the Main Menu. 2. When you are on the Minerals menu, click on the QR button (shown in the image below) in the top right corner.
3. This will take you to your camera interface and all you need to do is take a picture of the QR code of the mineral sample you are looking at. This will look like the image below.
4. The app will then automatically open the mineral information page corresponding to that particular mineral sample.
